unlocks.message:
Gems are personalized by your experiences.
Let's see a few examples.
unlocks.heading: LISTENED FOR 1,000 MINUTES
unlocks.title: Streaming PRODUCT unlocks a new element for your Gem

unlocks.message: Beyond streaming, real-world interactions are also possible, like discovering hidden objects.
unlocks.heading: FOUND A HIDDEN OBJECT
unlocks.title: The secret code on a hidden pool toy at Honest Jon's unlocks a rare element

unlocks.message: Gems are full of easter eggs. Visiting storied locations with friends might unlock a new element.
unlocks.heading: FOUND A SPECIAL LOCATION
unlocks.title: Visiting Heaven's alley with friends unlocks a surprise element for each of you

unlocks.message: Fans can also work together on community listening.
unlocks.heading: 1 MILLION COMMUNITY STREAMS
unlocks.title: Fans who owned the Gem before this milestone was reached unlock a limited element

unlocks.message: As more elements are unlocked, a Gem becomes increasingly personal to its collector.
unlocks.heading: NEW ELEMENT UNLOCKED
unlocks.title: You've unlocked all elements of this Gem

unlocks.message: Their Gem becomes a living reflection of their experiences with the album.
